DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study determine 30 milligram ( mg ) duloxetine effective treatment fibromyalgia compare placebo .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Adult Patients With Fibromyalgia
DOC.criteria: Meet study criterion fibromyalgia diagnosis . Have previously currently take duloxetine . Have diagnose certain psychosis , bipolar schizoaffective disorder Have pain symptom difficult differentiate fibromyalgia . Have seizure disorder , uncontrolled narrow angle glaucoma , acute liver injury ( hepatitis ) severe cirrhosis . Have primary Axis 1 diagnosis major depressive disorder generalize anxiety disorder within past year . Are pregnant breastfeed Have current previous diagnosis rheumatoid , infectious inflammatory arthritis autoimmune disease Have regional pain syndrome , fail back syndrome chronic localize pan relate past surgery Have serious unstable medical illness Have history substance abuse dependence within past year
